snippet: Kensington Palace has reopened after a £12 million renovation that created several new exhibits and revamped nearly every part of the building and grounds - from gardens first created in the 1730s to the interior State Rooms where royals such as...
abstract: Kensington Palace has reopened after a £12 million renovation that created several new exhibits and revamped nearly every part of the building and grounds - from gardens first created in the 1730s to the interior State Rooms where royals such as Queen Victoria and Princess Margaret once lived.

headline.main: Kensington Palace Reopens After Extensive Renovations
